general.gigTitle: design and develop a beautiful, bespoke wordpress website

sellerCard.description:
Welcome to Freshly Squeezed Design, the home of creative design solutions. We offer smart web design for smarter businesses, so whatever your needs get in touch today.

Are you thirsty for a fresh new look? In that case you’ve come to the right place. 

Together with our straightforward, no-jargon approach, you will receive a refreshing, one-to-one, service that we know is is sure to quench your thirst for great design. 

We're professional and knowledgeable but also super friendly and approachable. Please feel free to ask us any questions and we'll be happy to help.

Let's get started today.

description.content:
As a small, dedicated team of web design professionals we've been in business over ten years now. We offer a unique blend of marketing insight combined with dazzling web design skills so you get the full agency service without the price tag.

Whether youre a start-up taking your first steps into the online world or a web veteran looking to bring your companys website up to date and blitz the competition, we cant wait to help you achieve your goals. Your new website will be visually engaging to impress the pants off your customers, fully responsive to make sure it works beautifully on all of the latest mobiles and tablets and it will also feature an easy to use Content Management System [CMS] to enable even the biggest technophobes in your company to quickly and efficiently update your content.

Unlimited design revisions ensure you'll be 100% thrilled with the results. Who else offers that?

The packages shown are not set in stone, all of our web design packages can be tailored to your specific requirements. Please contact us with any questions or queries and we'll be happy to help.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What makes us Fiverr Pro sellers?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: PRO sellers are hand-vetted, professionals and field expert sellers. PRO statuses are given through a vigorous application process and are only assigned to sellers who have truly mastered their craft. Rest assured, we are the PROs you've been looking for and will help you every step of the way.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the difference between the packages and which one is suitable for me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The Silver package includes basic functionality with up to 6 pages. The Gold package also includes a live chat function, email marketing integration and up to 15 pages. The Ecommerce package includes a fully functional online store and payment facility.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the first stage in the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: In the first instance we'll help you create a design brief to explore any thoughts that you might for your project. At this stage you can also supply examples of any particular designs you might like. We'll never duplicate anything you show us, but it's always useful to have a visual reference.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website work on mobiles and tablets?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! Our websites utilise responsive technology which means they automatically adjust themselves to perfectly fit the screen of the device they’re being viewed on. Whether it’s a mobile, a tablet, a laptop or a desktop your site will look great – it’s almost like magic!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I own the rights to my site?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course! Everything that we create will be 100% owned by you and all access will be handed over accordingly once the project is completed.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are there any contracts or ongoing costs?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Most definitely not, once we've created your website you're not tied to us in any way shape or form and there won't be any nasty recurring bills or unexpected charges to pay.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I edit my site and if so how?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: All of our sites come with a fully featured Content Management System [CMS] and this means you can login from any device with an internet connection to quickly and easily make simple changes to text and images or add blog posts. No technical knowledge is required!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What about social media?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We can integrate all of your social media accounts into your website for you. From Facebook to Instragram we can integrate all of your accounts so all of your visitors can easily keep in touch with you across platforms. All at no extra cost.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my site be expandable in the future?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Many businesses want to start with a smaller website, but it’s important that your website is able to grow and expand as your business does. One of the advantages of working with WordPress is that any website that we design has the capacity to be upgraded without the need to start from scratch.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer support to help me use my site?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course! We’ll provide you with assistance to to help you get to grips with your site and we also include a free telephone or Skype consultation where we’ll walk you through everything you need to know to get the most out of your shiny new website.

reviews.comment: Antony and his team helped our company reaching the next level by creating a professional, international website. Besides the creative thinking, the response time was very quick and Antony is eager to help where ever he can. Would definately recommend.

I thought working with Antony was great, he and his team are great problem solvers and gave creative solutions to get the job done. I think they do a good job of interpreting what it is that you need and then executing it.

Antony's work was truly outstanding. The process of gathering requirements went smoothly, and he began with the homepage, surpassing our expectations with his remarkable design and information layout. We needed very few revisions because he skillfully integrated our content in the most effective design. The final website exceeded our vision, showcasing a modern and minimalist aesthetic while effectively representing our company's capabilities. I've previously worked with various website designers on Fiverr, but Antony's work is by far the best I've encountered. I will definitely return to Antony for all my future website design needs. Excellent job, and thank you for the incredible work!

Antony did an AMAZING job on our website! His attention to detail and code expertise really shone through. Plus, working with him was a breeze due to his deep understanding and prompt delivery time. 👏

I highly recommend Antony and his team to anyone looking for top-notch web development services. They are truly a cut above the rest, and I look forward to working with them again on future projects. Five stars all the way!
